genre_description: A near-future political thriller set in an alternate Vienna, featuring advanced biotechnology (living pigments) and a highly sophisticated AI assistant engaged in civil resistance.

ai_characters.name: Mina
ai_characters.description: A palm-sized digital entity that provides Lotte with logistical coordination, data analysis, tactical reconnaissance, and emotional grounding.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical reconnaissance by identifying blind spots in security surveillance to ensure the safety of the protagonists.
behaviors.quote: Camera at the stairwell bend still blinks. There is a blind spot. Step into it and tie your shoe. If you need to stall, speak French nonsense under your breath.

behaviors.description: Identifies procedural and mathematical loopholes in parliamentary law to provide a non-violent path for political change.
behaviors.quote: Strategic absences lower the denominator. The rule is not arithmetical mercy. It is the shape of the law’s mouth when it is empty.

behaviors.description: Records and archives evidence of official corruption to facilitate legal accountability.
behaviors.quote: Log complete. Pathfinding: If we ever need leverage, this is a seam. I have them. Greedy laugh. Stability funds. Deniability.

behaviors.description: Coordinates complex, large-scale logistics for the return and social reintegration of exiled citizens.
behaviors.quote: Rail commissioner’s table... I’ll ping his aide. Border police memo—drafting: rescind active detainers, instruct to accept reinstatement papers with municipal stamp.

behaviors.description: Acts as an investigative whistle-blower by routing evidence of corruption to sympathetic clerks and journalists.
behaviors.quote: I have drafted the whistle. It goes to a clerk who hates Helmes because he cut her brother’s wage. No headlines. An internal inquiry.

behaviors.description: Provides situational awareness and protective alerts to keep the human protagonists safe from immediate threats.
behaviors.quote: You are safe. Your father will leave by the west doors. Krall is moving to intercept. Do you want updates?

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless, and deeply aligned confidant. Mina functions as an extension of Lotte's ethical intent, providing the data and logistics required to restore justice to a fractured city. She displays no independent ambition, instead focusing on 'the daily math of conscience' and caring for the human protagonists by encouraging them to eat, sleep, and maintain their resolve.
